column1: Computational Statistics and Machine Learning MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe Computational Statistics and Machine Learning MScÂ at UCL teaches advanced analytical and computational skills for success in a data rich world. Designed to be both mathematically rigorous and relevant, the programme covers fundamental aspects of machine learning and statistics, with potential options in information retrieval, bioinformatics, quantitative finance, artificial intelligence, and machine vision.
